title: Ticks
content:
Hi,  
I am developing a brochure for a client of mine and I need to use ticks in a table (as in tick this box). Unfortunately I am setting the document in Gill Sans – I am looking for a suitable tick to use that doesn't look like a comic version (see Zapf Dingbats, Wingdings etc). Can anyone recommend a type face with a sexy tick???

Cheers  
Jason.
author: haildesign

comments.content: You could draw a simple Gill-like tick in Illustrator and use that. That's what I'd do anyway.

The tick (check mark) from Hypatia Sans might do, if you got that as a reg incentive for CS3.

T

Thanks Guys,  
Hypatia Sans seems to fit nicely.  
Cheers.
